Name: Inheritors
Details: A more radical version of the Antithesis Creed, the Inheritors believe that the Inner Sphere will decline in an upcoming series of disasters and cataclysms and that the peoples of Periphery will pick up the pieces after its collapse and build a better society. They consider their duty to be prepared for this event, by developing a military-industrial complex in the nations of the Periphery, to prepare them for the coming apocalypse.
